description:
This Bundle contains the games My Coloring Book 1 and My Coloring Book 2. In the bundle, you will find:

- Over 250 drawings of animals, flowers building and more
- An extensive color palette
- Different drawing styles
- A Save & Load system for your drawings
- Relaxing background music

Thanks to an amazing variety, My Coloring Books bundle is suitable for all, from children to adults. Start your colorful adventure now!
name: My Coloring Books - 2 in 1 Bundle
